amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to direct the payment of a portion of stewardship project revenues to the county in which the stewardship project occurs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Herrera Beutler.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Herrera Beutler amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
